title: Barack Obama Lamented the Attack on Paul Pelosi. Then He Got Heckled.
description: Mr. Obama was reflecting on the level of hostility in American politics when a man in the crowd at a rally for Democrats in Detroit shouted at him.
dc:creator: Neil Vigdor
media:credit: Emily Elconin for The New York Times
media:description: Former President Barack Obama reacts to a heckler during a Get Out The Vote rally with Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, left, and Michigan Democrats at Renaissance High School in Detroit on Saturday.
